scripts.deploy: aws s3 rm s3://ryanjcruz-personal-website --recursive && aws s3 sync build/ s3://ryanjcruz-personal-website
scripts.postdeploy: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id EV1QWQISMP3V7 --paths /* && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3MI95NZCY2T2A --paths /*
